description:
The Penguins get their chance to shine on the Yama Yama! Yama Arashi! Show!  Masaki wants his chance to roast coffee, but doesn’t get encouragement from everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nankyoku Sentai Penguinjaa / Madamada Abuitte Nanda!?
South Pole Squad Penguinger / Even More, What is Roasting!?
南極戦隊ペンギンジャー / まだまだ焙煎ってナンダ!?
